rooms.description: Small foyer leading to the living areas.
Open-plan space for family gatherings, adheres to Vastu principles by orienting towards the south-west direction for positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the living room ensuring easy circulation.
Compact kitchen area with modern amenities; designed keeping in mind local building norms and Vastu recommendations for food preparation areas on the north side.
A small room intended for domestic staff to reside; integrated within ground floor layout as per joint family needs.
Utility space for household storage; located near the kitchen area.

openings.description: A well-defined entrance with minimalistic design elements.
Windows to enhance natural light following Vastu guidelines.
A single window ensuring balanced illumination.
Minimalist balcony integrated with the living area; offers a view that enhances spatial experience.

notes.vastu_considerations: The design adheres to Vastu principles by orienting major spaces towards favorable cardinal directions, ensuring proper ventilation and light.
notes.building_norms: All dimensions and placements are designed in compliance with Indian residential building norms and guidelines for joint families.
